reviews.text: We dined with the beautiful sunset as a backdrop while enjoying the catch of the day, meagre, and a pigeon Wellington. Lili was an exceptional hostess and completed our experience at Quadro.
Incredible part of the world and a great place to eat - both the view and the food were amazing. Service from Lili and the team was brilliant, we had such a good time!

It was the best experience ever. The food is incredibly delicious, thank you chef it was amazing. I want to thank the staff for their attentiveness and smiles. I want to express my gratitude to Sandip for his exceptional service, positive mood, and kindness.

We decided to have dinner in Quadro because of good reviews. And yes-meal was excellent!! But service not-guys were confused and must say that only one of them was fast nad client-oriented(maybe his name was Roberto) We were sitting 45 minut only with water and prosecco. No bread, olive oil…Tables around us were served fast…so we didn’t understand.

Exceptional gourmet restaurant with tremendously varied and delicious menu. Small but perfectly balanced wine list.  We tried the short ribs, the duck and the octopus appetizers to our delight, one as good as the other. We also enjoyed our main courses the Secreto Ibérico pork was perfect, the steak was served at the perfect temperature and delicious. We also enjoyed the Sea Bass, what a treat. Replay came perfectly plated with delicious accompaniment and a visual and gourmet treat.
The service was professional but personal. Great restaurant to rival many of Michelin stared establishments I have had the pleasure to visit.
A must visit when in Malta. Enjoy!
